title: Blood: composition and functions
brief_description: Microphotography shows three cellular components of the blood and their functions. Time-lapse photography clearly indicates coagulation and fibrin formation; and the manufacture of cells in bone marrow from primitive cells is examined. Suitable for upper secondary level.
